sortParamsByRequiredFlag.description: Sort method arguments to place required parameters before optional parameters.

ensureUniqueParams.description: Whether to ensure parameter names are unique in an operation (rename parameters that are not).

allowUnicodeIdentifiers.description: boolean, toggles whether unicode identifiers are allowed in names or not, default is false

infoUrl.description: a URL where users can get more information about the application

infoEmail.description: an email address to contact for inquiries about the application

licenseInfo.description: a short description of the license

licenseUrl.description: a URL pointing to the full license

phpInvokerPackage.description: root package for generated php code

perlModuleName.description: root module name for generated perl code

pythonPackageName.description: package name for generated python code
